page.title: 10Anstruther Police Force
page.content: Anstruther Police Force consists of 12 officers covering an area from Crail to Lundin Links which takes about 30 minutes to patrol depending on the traffic. Seven officers are situated in neighbouring towns and receive most of their instructions by walkie-talkie or car radio. Based in Anstruther are 5 officers who carry a notebook, pencil, handcuffs, radio and whistle which is more for show now. The Anstruther Station has 2 cars both Vauxhall Astras. The station's busiest time is in the summer when all the holidaymakers are here. Our local sergeant helped to train Cellardyke Primary's Cycling Proficiency Teams who came first and second in the Fife Competition to win the RAC cup. This is the first year the competition has been held and we all felt very proud of our teams.
